gto.arsbotania.quests.0B61448F01656C1D.d: &9Runes&r are important components in many high-level synthesis recipes in &dFloral Magic&f, and must be crafted on an &aRune Altar&f.

When using the Rune Altar, first place the materials for the desired rune on it. This can be done by &aright-clicking&r or throwing the items directly. The altar also requires a mana supply, so make sure it's connected to an &aMana Burst&f.
After placing the materials, hover over the altar with a wand to view the synthesis progress. Once complete, throw a Living Rock into the altar and retrieve the rune with the wand.

Note: In &aRune Altar&f recipes, the parts of the rune used as catalysts are not consumed. Similar to the &aFloral Pedestal&f, you can automatically fill the last recipe's required items by &aright-clicking&r the altar with an empty hand after the recipe is completed.

It increases the total mana value and mana recovery speed and allows you to create and use second-level runes.
gto.arsbotania.quests.0D9354ABA2AE2A11.d: &2Incense&f can be infused with potion brews in the &aFloral Brewing&f stand. Place it on a &9Incense Plate&f and light it with flint and steel to release the effects within a 30-block radius centered on the plate, lasting sixty times longer than liquid potion brews.
gto.arsbotania.quests.0E2AD156E5EF263A.d: Requires an &aInscription Table&f for spell inscription
gto.arsbotania.quests.0E7E559F2750F7D3.d: When using this component on a Mana Diffuser, it will only fire when the &aMana Burst&f can hit a creature or player.
gto.arsbotania.quests.0F9DABC15ED589CB.d: This miscellaneous flower is used to detect whether your &aMana Pool&f is in profit or deficit.
Place a &dMana Indicator Flower&r next to the Mana Pool and observe the color change: red glow indicates a deficit, while blue glow indicates a surplus!
gto.arsbotania.quests.111649D7E16D869F.d: &9Spellcaster Wand&r can only inscribe a single spell and must be inscribed through an &aInscription Table&f.
The wand spell must start with Projectile > Accelerate and must be inscribed without any other release methods (such as touch, self, etc.).
This method can break the 10-spell limit. If you want to use Destruction, simply inscribe the Destruction spell alone.
gto.arsbotania.quests.12BEB76EB924379C.d: Allows the &aMana Burst&f to ignite blocks, but is ineffective on creatures.
gto.arsbotania.quests.13D401048A926A74.d: The Magic Line combines the &aFloral Magic&r and &eNew Magic&r mods
gto.arsbotania.quests.14DB8A515CA50932.d: &9&aWitch's Sword&f&r allows the attachment of touch-based spells.
The last effect of all spells on the sword will receive a level 1 amplification enhancement.
When inscribing spells with the &aInscription Table&f, do not use shape runes.
gto.arsbotania.quests.14EB725643E9F8FE.d: Allows the &aMana Burst&f to push blocks like a piston.
gto.arsbotania.quests.151648179684B088.d: &aRune Chalk&f is used to draw permanent runes on the ground. These runes will cast spells on creatures that pass over them.
To attach a spell to a rune, you need to inscribe the spell onto &e&aSpell Parchment&f&r using an &aInscription Table&f.
Note: &aRunes&r require a source of energy to drive them.
gto.arsbotania.quests.177658CA70DB0C89.d: &cFiery Lotus&r absorbs nearby combustible items/blocks (one by one) and generates &bMana&r by burning these materials.
gto.arsbotania.quests.17D7D34F519F7E5F.d: To make the final-stage spell book, you need to defeat the &e&aWild Chimaera&f&r.
This is a &aRitual&f that must be completed at the &9&aRitual Brazier&f&r.
gto.arsbotania.quests.182EBB06B81BDF98.d: Significantly reduces the total mana carried by the &aMana Burst&f, while greatly increasing the pulse speed and range.
gto.arsbotania.quests.18A2FBE2D4133FA2.d: &aArcane Pedestal&f is a necessary component for constructing the &aRitual Brazier&f and using the &aEnchantment Apparatus&f to synthesize items.
It is recommended to make 8 spares.
gto.arsbotania.quests.19D02325579F2AA8.d: &aVolcanic Mana Channel&f generates source energy by consuming combustible materials. &aSupreme Wood&f can produce additional source energy.
During combustion, surrounding stones are transformed into lava.
gto.arsbotania.quests.1C48F2612F2FA828.d: &2&aMana Burst&f&r directs the flow of mana by emitting &aMana Burst&f.
Use the &2&aForest Wand&f&r to bind the emitter to a block to set the pulse direction. While holding the wand, you can also view the status of the mana buffer and &aMana Burst&f.
gto.arsbotania.quests.1D86B2E553503E53.d: &aDominion Wand&f is used to control creatures encountered in the world! Each type of creature reacts differently to the wand, so be sure to check the old notes!
gto.arsbotania.quests.1DCFC67A8E3DCA2C.d: Similar to the &aAlchemical Catalyst&f, the &9&aSmelting Catalyst&f&r, when placed under the &aMana Pool&f, unlocks cyclic transformation recipes.
gto.arsbotania.quests.205BBDFBCA582E3B.d: &2&aForest Wand&f&r is an essential tool for &dFloral Magic&f.
The wand has &aBinding&r and &9Function&r dual modes:
&aBinding mode&f&r is used to connect Floral Magic devices, sneak-&aright-click&r the first block/flower, then sneak-&aright-click&r the target to establish a connection.
&9Function mode&f&r can rotate blocks like a wrench.
gto.arsbotania.quests.2162EA0216E27D68.d: Throw it into the pool to charge/discharge mana, use the &2&aForest Wand&f&r to switch modes by sneaking-&aright-clicking&r.
Note: The tablet does not disappear.
gto.arsbotania.quests.227DBA8836021B0B.d: Initially, you need an &aSource Jar&f to collect Source.
gto.arsbotania.quests.23A2865FBE7831AB.d: Now you need to build a platform for the &9Terrasteel Aggregator&r.
The platform needs to be arranged in a checkerboard pattern with 5 Living Rocks and 4 Lapis Lazuli blocks. Placing the forge plate on the central Living Rock completes the construction.
gto.arsbotania.quests.23ADD20D9B1AE0F3.d: Use &b&aWhite Tulpel&f&r to transform stones into Living Rock!
gto.arsbotania.quests.26B836339560E939.d: Killing Piglin Brutes can obtain Netherite Ingots
gto.arsbotania.quests.271653DEE9363B28.d: Use &b&aWhite Tulpel&f&r to transform dirt into Living Dirt!
gto.arsbotania.quests.27CD17C4B3613171.d: Combine 4 &aGaia Souls&f with a Terrasteel Ingot for the &aGaia Ritual&f. :)
gto.arsbotania.quests.295C77EEC89000FC.s: Generate Source through creature death and animal breeding
gto.arsbotania.quests.2AB5A33EC30AEA86.d: 炼药锅的概率机制是一个复杂的函数，不过你只需要几次持续的配方运作就能获得溶剂
gto.arsbotania.quests.2CBBE8EF07B1D3DA.d: &b&aMana Distributor&f&r can split the input mana pulse to multiple &aMana Pools&f.
&dSparks&r are crucial for advanced &dFloral Magic&f as they direct the transmission of mana.
Place sparks on the &aMana Pool&f and the receiving block to "wirelessly transmit" mana.
Use the &2&aForest Wand&f&r to remove sparks by sneaking-&aright-clicking&r.
gto.arsbotania.quests.2D0CF18C8B2ABB7D.d: Placed near growing plants or saplings, it generates Source. Supreme Wood provides additional Source!
Note: Bone meal does not generate Source.
gto.arsbotania.quests.2D1533268C835672.d: At the cost of reducing the initial capacity and accelerating mana loss, it greatly increases the movement speed of the &aMana Burst&f.
gto.arsbotania.quests.2F01BF021E1BE0A2.d: Combining the &aMana Ring&f with a Terrasteel Ingot upgrades it to the &dAdvanced Mana Ring&f&r, increasing the mana storage capacity by 4 times.
gto.arsbotania.quests.30F7B68093D76590.d: In the &aFloral Brewing&f stand, use potion bottles, mana, and reagents to brew &9Magic Brew&r, which has similar effects to potions.
gto.arsbotania.quests.3182E8AF755104E4.d: When blocking damage, the &9&aWitch's Shield&f&r grants the user short-term &aMana Regeneration&f and &aSpell Damage Boost&f.
Additionally, the shield continuously consumes the wearer's mana for self-repair.
gto.arsbotania.quests.32DF4BC46620F952.d: Placing the &d&aAlchemical Catalyst&f&r under the &b&aMana Pool&f&r unlocks &9Alchemy&r, allowing for item transformation (such as rotting flesh into leather).
gto.arsbotania.quests.33682F4B44950123.d: For magic, we need special magical wood!
gto.arsbotania.quests.371E5E1E435E41AA.d: To use the productive flowers of &dFloral Magic&f, you need &aMysterious Flowers&f.
To obtain &aMysterious Flowers&f, you need to make &aFloral Fertilizer&f, apply it to grass blocks to grow &aMysterious Flowers&f, and apply it to stones to grow &aMysterious Mushrooms&f.
It is recommended to make it directly in the &eInfusion Chamber&r.
When you have obtained all the &aMysterious Flowers&r, you can use the &eEnchantment Apparatus&r for mass production. You will need super super super many &aMysterious Flowers&r later.
gto.arsbotania.quests.3722E5A8BE99C5B1.d: Allows the &aMana Burst&f to consume its own mana to pierce through obstacle blocks.
gto.arsbotania.quests.379AC75F99212089.d: &9&aMana Ring&f&r is a wearable &aMana Tablet&f, which can be equipped and used like an accessory.
gto.arsbotania.quests.3A20210242A1C865.d: Although you cannot enter the &dElf Portal&r, you can perform &2Elf Trading&f by throwing specific items into the portal. Each trade consumes mana!
The obtained materials can be used to upgrade equipment, such as making a &2Elf Mana Burst&f.
Throwing the &aFloral Magic Codex&f into the portal upgrades it to a version with &eElfology&f, gaining more advanced knowledge of &dFloral Magic&f.
gto.arsbotania.quests.3B2C198F26EC923F.d: Combine Dragonstone, &aElf Dust&f, and &aSource Steel Ingot&, and consume 1.5 pool of mana to obtain Elf Steel!
Obtaining the &aForging Template&f requires using &aSource Steel Sword&f or other plant magic weapons to kill witches or summoners.
gto.arsbotania.quests.3CD45533D0BDF26D.d: When the &aMana Burst&f from this lens hits a block, it makes the block fall like gravel.
gto.arsbotania.quests.3D4D88B8BE881351.d: If you want to cast more powerful spells, you need to unlock new runes for the spell book through the &e&aInscription Table&f&r.
Runes are divided into three levels, and unlocking each level requires experience points and specific materials.

The &aInscription Table&f can also be used to inscribe spells onto &aSpell Parchment&f. To do this, place the parchment on the table, hold the spell book, and sneak-right-click the table to select the spell.

When making runes, hold the book and right-click the &aInscription Table&f, search for the target rune, and click the bottom selection button. Right-click the required materials to throw them in and synthesize the rune, then learn it by using the rune.
Note: The workbench can automatically extract materials from nearby containers.
gto.arsbotania.quests.3D6CC306F06FEF34.d: If you really can't find ore veins, you can use heteromorphic flowers and living rock to transform
gto.arsbotania.quests.3D862A3D3F83CA26.d: &9&aEnchantment Apparatus&f&r is used to make various items in the mod, requiring source energy to operate.
This device is a multi-block structure and must be synthesized with the &aArcane Pedestal&f.
First, place the &aArcane Core&f on the ground, then place the &aEnchantment Apparatus&f on top of it. Finally, surround the device with &aArcane Pedestals&f.
gto.arsbotania.quests.3FD702B5AB006402.d: Have you ever thought about floating and moving anywhere?
This belt grants you the ability to levitate. Activation method: Sneak in mid-air (falling or jumping).
gto.arsbotania.quests.40BC67BDEE15D1DE.d: To make &aSource Crystal&f, place &aCatseye&r or &aOlivine&f into the &aInfusion Chamber&f and transform it!
gto.arsbotania.quests.41A0BE357C8A74E1.d: &9&aAlchemical Source Channel&f&r can extract source energy from adjacent potion flasks.
The extraction amount varies depending on the potion type and alchemy complexity.
gto.arsbotania.quests.441C0659ED28D935.d: Making a first-level rune requires 3 levels of experience.
gto.arsbotania.quests.457DE8C154641437.d: &9&aRitual Brazier&f&r is used for performing rituals and can also be used as decoration. To light the brazier, use a bright spell on it.
Performing a ritual also requires an &aArcane Pedestal&f. Since there are many types of rituals, please refer to the &eOld Notes&r for each one!
Hold the codex and press Ctrl on the &aRitual Stand&f to operate.
gto.arsbotania.quests.478352E24CE1F45F.d: Makes the &aMana Burst&f emit holiday fireworks when it hits a block.
gto.arsbotania.quests.4C22BA5824662C7E.d: Combine &4Redstone&r with &2&aMana Burst&f&r to make &9&aRedstone Mana Burst&f&r.
This device can be controlled by redstone signals and will only emit mana bursts when receiving a redstone pulse.
gto.arsbotania.quests.4CC46A4E71320140.d: Please refer to the &a&aCodex&f &dFloral Magic&f&r to understand how to use this prism.
gto.arsbotania.quests.4CED346215DDBAC0.d: Significantly extends the duration before the &aMana Burst&f starts to lose mana, but also reduces the pulse movement speed.
gto.arsbotania.quests.4E02DC8A474A4A2F.d: &a&aWhite Tulpel&f&r is one of the first magical flowers you make!
This flower can transform &2logs&r or &9stones&r within an 8-block radius around it into &2Living Wood&r or &9Living Rock&r, respectively, in a 1-block radius area centered on the flower.
gto.arsbotania.quests.4E03AC9D56202353.d: Combine the &2&aElf Mana Burst&f&r with Dragonstone Power and &e&aGaia Soul&f&r to create the top-level &aMana Burst&f.
gto.arsbotania.quests.4E9804ED6DE64BDF.d: 以太蒸汽你会用到很多
gto.arsbotania.quests.4ECFB1256BD6A7AA.d: &9&aMultimedia Hopper&f&r is a simplified version of the item indexing system, which can request items from the network via redstone signals.

When configuring the requested items, place the corresponding items in the item display frame on the block. If there are multiple display frames, the hopper will randomly select one. Rotate the items in the display frame to adjust the request quantity.
For more detailed information, please refer to the &a&aCodex&f &dFloral Magic&f&r.
gto.arsbotania.quests.504ADBD7E2476827.d: Allows the &aMana Burst&f to produce a rebound effect when it contacts the surface of a block.
gto.arsbotania.quests.50A2D68A83A50F47.d: Summon an enhanced &5&aGaia's Guardian&f&r with a Gaia Ingot to obtain more &e&aGaia Soul&f&r, and the guardian has a chance to drop &e&aFate Dice&f&r.
gto.arsbotania.quests.51162B9185A45BB1.d: This bow can have spells inscribed through the &aInscription Table&f.
Consumes mana to transform arrows into &aSpell Arrows&f, which trigger the inscribed spell upon hitting a target.
If there are no arrows, it will fire a zero-damage spell arrow; if mana is insufficient, it will fire a normal arrow.
&9&aWitch's Bow&f&r can also use special enhancement arrows to increase spell power.
gto.arsbotania.quests.533624CA5C2A7BBD.d: Allows the &aMana Burst&f to consume its own mana to deal damage to the hit creature.
gto.arsbotania.quests.542C6D76B579886C.d: When the Magic Flower completes its growth cycle, its petals can be used to make magic fibers.
These fibers are used to synthesize various items, including your first set of magic armor!
gto.arsbotania.quests.5732936F1FD1D4AE.d: Makes the &aMana Burst&f affect dropped items, experience orbs, and falling blocks within its range, making their movement trajectory completely synchronized with the pulse.
gto.arsbotania.quests.5766C8B9E850C186.d: To make the synthesis material for the Arcane Core, the &9&aSource Crystal&f&r, we 'need to first build the &6&aInfusion Chamber&f&r.
&aInfusion Chamber&f requires source energy to infuse items. It itself generates a small amount of source energy and can also use &aSource Jar&f as an energy source.
Some recipes also require &aArcane Pedestals&f to be arranged around it.
gto.arsbotania.quests.58EC47584C773B82.d: Using the &aEnchantment Device&f structure, we will make our first seed——&5&aMana Flower Seed&f.
Used for cultivating magical fabric materials!
gto.arsbotania.quests.597E4D997A20736D.d: Use &b&aWhite Daisies&f to transform High Wood into Living Wood!
gto.arsbotania.quests.5A7FF6D0AED656DC.d: Shorten the startup time for &aMana Pulse&f to start consuming mana, but simultaneously reduce the rate of consumption.
gto.arsbotania.quests.5CB5F4CD521F6361.d: With the help of elemental materials, you can upgrade sparks using the &dEnhancement Core&r. Right-click the spark with the Enhancement Core in hand to upgrade. Sneaking and right-clicking the spark will &aremove&f the enhancement effect.
Dispersion Enhancement: Makes the spark draw mana from its tank to charge the mana containers of nearby players.
Dominion Enhancement: Forces absorption of mana from non-enhanced sparks' tanks.
Invisibility Enhancement: Distributes the stored mana to nearby non-enhanced or dispersion-type sparks.
Isolation Enhancement: Prevents the spark from interacting with Dominion/Invisibility-enhanced sparks.
gto.arsbotania.quests.5CFBA24B3E0CDEDD.d: Hold a spellbook and press C to open the spell creation interface.
Each spell must include a casting form. Initially, you have three basic forms: projectile, self-cast, and contact.
The effects section determines how the spell functions; a single spell can have up to 9 effects.
Beginner phase can use damage and destruction effects.
Choose the form and effects combination, name it to create a new spell.
gto.arsbotania.quests.5E2AA5695D1F21D7.d: &0&aBlack Lotus&f only exists in chests and can be infused with condensed mana by pouring it into a &aMana Pool&f.
gto.arsbotania.quests.5EF08646D8F4C432.d: Make &aMana Pulse&f capable of penetrating blocks, but it will shorten the pulse's lifespan.
gto.arsbotania.quests.60778D26C539B172.d: 如果你已经有光伏电站，打开UI放入一组太阳花，你就可以使用它来简易快速地获取魔力！
gto.arsbotania.quests.632BC46928CC9A8C.d: Using the &9&aWitch's Mirror&f, you can trigger your own spell when used.
Spells cast through this mirror consume less mana and have a longer duration.
When engraving, do not use form symbols.
gto.arsbotania.quests.634E71DBAE81D197.d: Through &dPlant Magic&f, you can use &9&aMultimedia Sparks&f to construct a &dMultimedia Network&f above a container.

The network requires at least one &bMain Node&r &9&aMultimedia Spark&f as its core, then can be expanded with any number of &aMultimedia Sparks&f. Sparks of the same color will automatically connect within an 8-block range to form an item network.
Sparks can only recognize the items beneath them and can only access items through the top. All items within the network can be accessed by multimedia components such as Funnels and Indexers.
gto.arsbotania.quests.63DD7F5A4441ACE7.d: To craft a second-tier rune, you need to consume 5 levels of experience.
Also requires the &9Mage's&a Spellbook&f as a synthesis medium.
gto.arsbotania.quests.64D0E66CB4FBEC82.d: To start using it, you need to synthesize a &eNovice Spellbook&r.
This is where you create and store spells.
Pressing the &9C&r key will open the 'Create Spell' page. There are multiple tabs on the left, but the main three are: Spell Creation, &aColor Picker&f, and Enchanter.
This spellbook only allows you to create and use first-tier runes. To create more powerful spells, you need to upgrade the spellbook!
gto.arsbotania.quests.65238A6DCDDDFA0D.d: To craft &aTerrasteel&r, you need to build a multi-block structure. The first step is to synthesize &9Terrastone&f.
gto.arsbotania.quests.665B4A8FF5277316.d: Make gravity influence the trajectory of &aMana Pulse&f to form a parabolic path, while slightly extending the duration before it starts consuming mana.
gto.arsbotania.quests.66F1609053B5407C.d: Many accessories imbued with the power of &e&aGaia's Soul&f await exploration! Remember to check the details!
All descriptions can be found in the &a&aLexicon&f &dPlant Magic&f section.
gto.arsbotania.quests.68DC8A2B4BEF9878.d: Allows &aMana Pulse&f to dye hit dyeable blocks (including connected blocks) and sheep.
gto.arsbotania.quests.6A0ED6CCE3C4BDFE.d: Construct a checkerboard base with 5 Glows and place gold blocks in the remaining 4 spaces, then place an Elemental Condenser on the central Glow.
Similar to Terrasteel synthesis, requires &aSparks&f to transfer mana. Sparks need to be equipped with Dominion Enhancement to function as an infuser.
Now you can produce Elemental Steel!
gto.arsbotania.quests.6A1C0B17B22CE50F.d: The &9&aMana Boost Pendant&f increases your maximum mana.
The &e&aMana Regeneration Pendant&f increases your mana regeneration speed.
gto.arsbotania.quests.6A56574BC562B227.d: When equipped, the &9&aHalo Ring&f continuously generates mana slowly and injects it into mana storage items in your inventory.
gto.arsbotania.quests.6B511C8B572E8940.d: The energy bar at the bottom left of the screen represents your mana pool!
As the mod progresses, you can improve mana capacity or casting efficiency in various ways. Upgrading the spellbook can also enhance mana!
gto.arsbotania.quests.6DAA82B5F94AF9F8.d: The &9&aLuminous Flask&f summons floating light sources around the user.
The &e&aVoid Flask&f destroys picked-up items (filterable) at the cost of mana.
Configure items for destruction: secondary hand-click the flask or place the flask on an &aEngraving Table&f with items.
Needs to be in the hotbar to function.
gto.arsbotania.quests.6F3602F5600A6221.d: To craft a third-tier rune, you need to consume 10 levels of experience.
gto.arsbotania.quests.6FBE0BF8A7ADBB26.d: Upgrade the &2&aMana Launcher&f by installing a &9&aMana Lens&f at the front. The basic lens has no special effects.
Upgrade the lens to give &aMana Pulse&f special effects. Make colored or prismatic lenses using dyes or &aMana Pearls&f.
Combine runes with specific items to make advanced lenses. Use &a&aSlimeball&f to fuse two lenses into a &9Composite Lens&f, stacking enhancements.
gto.arsbotania.quests.705706C604CECF1D.d: 本包内也有无线魔力网络，且储量无限！
gto.arsbotania.quests.70C25BFA6FFA1799.d: Enhance the &aHalo Ring&f with Terrasteel Ingots to significantly increase the mana generation rate of the ring.
gto.arsbotania.quests.70C5A902C0D26628.d: Place specific items into the &b&aMana Pool&f to infuse &9Mana&f.
Check the synthesis recipe via JEI for mana requirements of each item.
gto.arsbotania.quests.7440E522FC31C341.d: The &9&aMultimedia Crystal&f displays the total amount of a specified item in the spark's network above it. Use it by right-clicking the crystal with the item in hand.
gto.arsbotania.quests.79A19D0B2F94EFDC.d: Make &aMana Pulse&f automatically track nearby mana-accepting blocks, while slightly reducing pulse speed.
gto.arsbotania.quests.79BE48D56622542F.d: Now we have basic flowers, we can use the &9&aAlchemy Apparatus&f to transform ordinary plants into functional mana-producing flowers!
To activate the &aMystical Petal's&f energy, inject &bWater&f into the Alchemy Apparatus first. You can do this by right-clicking with a water bucket or throwing a water bucket directly.
To synthesize, place the items into the Alchemy Apparatus. Right-click to retrieve any placed items.
Tip: After your first synthesis, right-clicking &a&aAir&f within 20 seconds will quickly repeat the last recipe, convenient for batch production!
gto.arsbotania.quests.7A359C1F5E041C4F.d: Now we have made &bLivingstone&r, we can start synthesizing &9&aMana Pool&f.
The &aMana Pool&f is the core facility for storing mana. Once the pool contains enough mana, you can convert specific resources into magical materials by placing items into the mana-infused pool.
To &bgenerate mana&r, you need to craft &2&aMana Spreader&f, such as &cFire Lotus&r.
Hint: &aMana Pool&f can store up to 1,000,000 mana. Holding a &2&aForest Staff&f and observing the pool will show the current mana level.
gto.arsbotania.quests.7A82D66B1B138F0F.d: Double the mana capacity of &aMana Pulse&f, but reduce transmission speed and increase mana loss for long-distance transmission.
gto.arsbotania.quests.7AD4D212633DAEC8.d: Inject entropy into &aMana Pulse&f—essentially, it will explode when hitting objects that cannot receive mana.
gto.arsbotania.quests.7B3FAF5CA4DD217C.d: By using the &aAlchemy Apparatus&f, we can create various flowers that provide assistance during adventures. These flowers are divided into two categories: &9&aFunctional Flowers&f and &a&aMana-producing Flowers&f.

&9&aFunctional Flowers&f are flowers that assist daily tasks. For example, &7Funnel Orchid&r will operate like a funnel, absorbing items within a certain range. Some &aFunctional Flowers&f require &dMana&f to function.

&a&aMana-producing Flowers&f are flowers that generate &dMana&f in different ways. The most commonly used mana-producing flower is &cFire Lotus&r, which generates mana by consuming nearby burnable materials like coal.

In this task chain, tasks with &cSquare&r icons represent &aMana-producing Flowers&f, while &9Circular&r icons represent &aFunctional Flowers&f. You can also check the &a&aLexicon&f &dPlant Magic&f section for detailed functions of each flower.
gto.arsbotania.quests.7B95C7407A1F5550.d: This component converts the pulse mode of the &aMana Launcher&f to emit continuous particle streams instead of short pulses. Does not consume mana. Very suitable for decorative purposes.
gto.arsbotania.quests.7DF7F9CD9A795E69.d: The &5&aMultimedia Index&f is an interactive interface to access &9Multimedia Network&f resources, allowing you to call upon network resources built by &aMultimedia Sparks&f.

When used, approach the index to intercept nearby players' &aChat Messages&f. Players can request items by entering commands, for example, &b10 &aIron Ingots&f; if the network has the items, they will be automatically distributed.
More operation guides can be found in the &a&aLexicon&f &dPlant Magic&f section.
gto.arsbotania.title: Magical Line

gto.chemical.quests.052144556E5F0F65.des: &eCan be used as rocket fuel for tier 5 and below

One bucket of high-octane can produce 48000000EU, which is 3.4 times that of high-sixteen, but the product line is also more complex!
gto.chemical.quests.0FA40D13A8103C2F.des: By pyrolyzing logs, you can distill byproducts such as charcoal, and then distill further to obtain wood acetate, wood gas, and wood tar for further distillation
而多出来的木炭则再进行热解操作，煤焦油再蒸馏即可.
Other routes can also be used, but this route is more comprehensive.

gto.chemical.quests.139432EF935D1E99.des: &6You may notice that the hydrogen sulfide electrolysis has been removed, if you need &cSulfur Powder&r from petrochemicals, you will need a &cDesulfurizer&r
&rOf course, the hydrogen sulfide has not been removed from the chemreactor recipes, if you need it you can also keep it to synthesize the chemical formula directly.
Higher-grade plastic with a wider range of applications
gto.chemical.quests.14568E9B638FC16A.des: The distilled products of liquidized air &6can provide a large variety of rare gases&r
With this, your blast furnace will no longer lack rare gas supply
gto.chemical.quests.14568E9B638FC16A.tit: The air in the End is so fragrant, why are my eyes purple?
gto.chemical.quests.17AF85D73DDCC646.des: You may have noticed that the electrolysis recipe for hydrogen sulfide has been removed. If you need sulfur powder from petrochemicals, you will need a &cdesulfurizer&r
Of course, the hydrogen sulfide recipe has not been deleted from the chemical reactions. If you need it, you can keep it and directly synthesize it with the chemical formula
gto.chemical.quests.17B2FE7B42729497.des: After completing the wood processing line, this fuel is the rocket fuel you can access at HV
gto.chemical.quests.1A162211142DF255.des: More complex synthesis steps, not recommended for burning electricity, only used for loading rocket fuels

&rMainly used for chip material synthesis and assembly

Early in-game required &6Nitrogen&r and &6Oxygen&r can be collected by air centrifuge
Air is also a regular for internal combustion engines and gas engines, prepare for the fuel god and large benzene cycle fuel god routes
gto.chemical.quests.21FE87B6569A7C62.sub: Finally, we can burn ingots quickly

gto.chemical.quests.2638049AB975F7E4.des: Put in &6Dimensional Data&r and &6Vacuum Freezer&r to produce &6Liquid Air&r
gto.chemical.quests.2638049AB975F7E4.tit: Want to Get It All in One Step?
gto.chemical.quests.26EF5FA36E0879C8.des: Congratulations on entering the OpV era by achieving this. Go out and walk around, look at the trees and flowers

Higher-tier plastics with broader application ranges.

gto.chemical.quests.2FD6B657F899578B.des: When you are proficient in preparing the materials for polytetrafluoroethylene synthesis, and try to synthesize in a chemreactor, you finally discover that the recipe has changed to a polymer reactor recipe
Simple plastics can be synthesized in a chemreactor in the early stages, but other higher-tier plastics will use a polymer reactor for synthesis, along with other specific chemical materials
Here we will briefly introduce these materials
gto.chemical.quests.2FD6B657F899578B.tit: Why Can't My Plastic Be Synthesized in a Chemreactor?
gto.chemical.quests.3A380B8474CB1EC5.des: Prepare more distillation towers, stainless steel is also needed. Burn more, burn faster!
gto.chemical.quests.3A380B8474CB1EC5.sub: HV Stage —— You Can't Escape It
gto.chemical.quests.45971388CF90B954.des: Preferred material for gas power generation lines, just this stuff is easy to make
Gas has a lower calorific value compared to fuel, but the convenience of obtaining it makes up for this
One bucket of benzene produces 352000EU (high-sixteen is four times this)
gto.chemical.quests.45971388CF90B954.tit: Embrace the Great Benzene Cycle God
gto.chemical.quests.45F1C570886B38C5.des: Mainly used for photoresist film or line
gto.chemical.quests.46A2DD7AE5DD109E.des: Upper-level replacement for mixed fuels, but still not recommended for power generation due to the trouble of synthesizing hydrazine.
&eCan be used as rocket fuel for tier 4 and below
gto.chemical.quests.479EDE838B23AFC7.des: After desulfurization, the products can be used to produce diesel or undergo steam cracking distillation
Steam can be obtained not only by boiler, but also by fluid heater, the latter is the fastest way to obtain steam in high-voltage situations
gto.chemical.quests.479EDE838B23AFC7.tit: Steam Cracking and Distillation, Quite Common
gto.chemical.quests.482F9110F2896CC9.des: One of the core synthesis materials for the Universal Processor

gto.chemical.quests.4A651F3100EEFC5B.des: The plastic component material for the &6ZPM and UV machine casing&r
An advanced version of polytetrafluoroethylene, like polyethylene, recipes that use it as a material further halve their consumption compared to those using polytetrafluoroethylene
gto.chemical.quests.5095C793089FC8FC.des: Its extremely cold nature makes it very suitable as a frequent inhabitant of the culture dish
Often used in biological circuit synthesis lines
&eCan be used as rocket fuel for stage six and below
gto.chemical.quests.5095C793089FC8FC.tit: Faster cooling ability than a snow bucket

gto.chemical.quests.62FBD1454322B93D.des: Often used in glue synthesis and its upper material synthesis

gto.chemical.quests.684D2B29BED59876.tit: It's time to say goodbye to long production lines
gto.chemical.quests.69A4E61D83D26E94.des: Bio-diesel or diesel plus nitromethane can produce High Octane 16, nitromethane is easy to obtain its synthesis chemical material through the &cWood Chemical Route&r
One barrel of High Octane 16 can produce 1440000 EU
gto.chemical.quests.69A4E61D83D26E94.tit: High Octane 16, the fuel favored by the Church of Fuel.
gto.chemical.quests.6B04A4D8C5464CFA.des: &6IV and LUV machine casing&r plastic component material
Advanced plastic, on the recipes using polyethylene, can halve the consumption
It is also a main synthesis material for the Large Chemical Reactor
gto.chemical.quests.70FAF5DB5018B0B8.des: Pairing with ethanol from the Wood Chemical Route can produce &6Bio-diesel
Of course, you can also make it into &6High Octane 16 Fuel&r

gto.chemical.quests.747142ADB664038D.des: These two are frequent guests in cable synthesis and also in component assembly lines
gto.chemical.quests.759E3183435B137A.des: RP-1 rocket fuel, which can be easily synthesized after the EV era, and its simple synthesis characteristics after completing the Wood Chemical Route make it a place in fuel generation after EV
One barrel is 2048000 EU, 1.4 times that of High Octane 16
&eCan be used as fuel for stage two and below
gto.chemical.quests.76E516FC62A472EF.des: &6UIV and UXV machine casing&r plastic component material
Higher grade plastic, with a wider range of applications
gto.chemical.quests.76E516FC62A472EF.tit: The last plastic shell you can obtain
gto.chemical.quests.78F8D94DB059ACC4.des: Subsequent integrated processing factories, requiring multiple blocks, prepare the materials before coming

gto.chemical.quests.7BC5C696C89B17E3.tit: Solved the problem of RP-1 being not durable

Different from the Chemical Distortion Instrument next door, you need to wash it with nanites, it is recommended to prepare a large amount of nanites before running it automatically
The module main block is placed on the tail end of the polytetrafluoroethylene pipe, facing the direction opposite to the main block of the machine

Molten Alloy is similar to the hot ingot produced by the Industrial Furnace, and needs to be cooled by a &6Vacuum Cryopump&r to be further processed
When you see new alloys later, you can directly try to find their molten alloy recipes in the Alloy Smelter

gto.ev.quests.3C7AE4505ACE7C80.subtitle: Keep away from kids
gto.ev.quests.3EDC674F36EDC52E.descripti: 欢迎！你已经解锁了GTO的一条新的支线——净化水
随着芯片制作越发精密，普通的蒸馏水已经不能满足切割晶圆的需要。净化水厂是整个净化水网络的核心！
gto.ev.quests.45D5AB8BE1006124.descripti: Go to &6Ceres&r to complete this task
gto.ev.quests.479C7C9D5519FC41.descripti: Nothing can stop you from flying towards the stars again

If you haven't changed your key settings, press the &e[J]&r key to adjust digging speed, it's not recommended to set it too high during debugging production lines
&7&oIf you are playing on a multiplayer server and messed something up, I foresee your friends bringing another Mallet to find you......&r&r
gto.ev.quests.49CD464A77D897E3.descripti: Chemical Vapor Deposition (CVD) is an advanced material preparation technique, which you will need in the future to make large quantities of new materials with various functions

Go to &6Venus&r to complete this task
gto.ev.quests.5612C7735BC4F5BC.descripti: T4 level Coil Blocks, incorporating the results of all your mining and production lines so far

gto.ev.quests.5B98FF5DDD4B2629.descripti: Think it's too expensive? Don't worry, you will eventually find a cheaper path

gto.ev.quests.5FC85281DA794E02.descripti: You need more advanced rubber to make the troublesome &6Conveyor Belt&r and &6Electric Pump&r, and &6IV cables&r starting with the EV era
Give it the attention it deserves, establish a large-scale and continuous production line!
gto.ev.quests.63B3B1533377F7BA.descripti: Checklist: Diodes, also in SMD version
gto.ev.quests.63B3B1533377F7BA.subtitle: Cheaper IV circuits
gto.ev.quests.67E7B62710A78614.descripti: Regardless of whether produced by Explosion Chamber or Electric Arc Furnace, both require &9Zero Gravity&r, this is your second visit to the space station

Distilling certain air can obtain &6very rare gaseous substances&r, you should consider setting up a dedicated production line to continuously produce these substances

gto.ev.quests.79257FEB76383E7C.descripti: Obtained &6Advanced Circuit Assembler Ⅲ&r? Throw it into your ultra-clean room, &6Nano Circuits&r are about to be produced!

Nether Warts are not included because you need to go to the Nether

gto.generator.quests.019C9690E0F61291.de: Silicon Ore Generator, small machines are more for special cases like clean rooms. Putting a mining rig or drilling rig in space.
However, due to the widespread use of wireless energy, they seem very weak.
gto.generator.quests.030491A0774CBB21.de: The wind power of a wind turbine generator depends on the Y-axis height of the generator itself. On rainy days, it gets 1.5 times wind power bonus, and on thunderstorms, it gets 2 times wind power bonus.
&cNote that the generator may explode due to excessive wind power. Specifically, placing the original wind turbine generator below height 511 will cause it to explode immediately.&r
gto.generator.quests.04C2C9DEC4F1896C.de: Solar energy generation depends on the dimension the machine is located in.
In a space station, you can ignore weather and day-night cycles for generation, and achieve the highest generation.
&cThe maximum generation in normal mode is 1aHv&r
gto.generator.quests.06334C9B56AD3DAF.de: A single lightning strike can generate 6aUEV
gto.generator.quests.085FD41E02501112.de: A classic Stirling Generator, directly burns items to generate power.
gto.generator.quests.0BC559FBADF1D6EB.de: Plug in a lightning rod, it can work during rainy weather.
It doesn't work like the lightning rod in GT5; it occasionally gets struck by lightning. Power generation is unstable, but can be improved by stacking multiple units.
A single lightning strike can generate 6aUHV.
gto.generator.quests.0BC559FBADF1D6EB.su: No more sunny days in the main world from now on
gto.generator.quests.0C1CAE964ADB9D70.de: After obtaining Fusion MK2, you can start plasma energy generation.
Supercritical Steam Generation is second only to Silicon Ore Reactor in power output.
The difficulty of MHD Generation lies in maintaining plasma output.
gto.generator.quests.0E1AACD8524CAED6.de: The primary fuel for this series of generators is Biodiesel and Heavy Fuel. Due to the low fuel value of semi-liquid fuels, MV-HV generators need to be replaced with internal combustion engines or gas turbines.
gto.generator.quests.127FAEFE180B7702.de: Steam production relies on boilers. It can be compressed into high-pressure steam for generation.
gto.generator.quests.12DA091EB0EBBD9C.de: The recommended rocket fuel is mentioned in the Chemicals chapter.
This series is the upper-level replacement for internal combustion engines, and with the help of rotor capacity, it can be a contender even in ZPM late game.
However, for new generators unlocked after LUV, it is somewhat weak.
gto.generator.quests.18A9B7E4B44D5230.de: Generate power using Ultrahigh Energy Fuels, providing additional plasma for 16 parallel generation.
Ultrahigh Energy Fuel 1 uses &cCupronickel Plasma&r for parallel generation.
Ultrahigh Energy Fuel 2 uses &cShadowsky Dust Plasma&r for parallel generation.
Ultrahigh Energy Fuel 3 uses &cMithril Plasma&r for parallel generation.
Ultrahigh Energy Fuel 4 uses &cMetastable Isotope Plasma&r for parallel generation.
In normal mode, using Ultrahigh Energy Fuel 1 for parallel generation results in 1aMAX capacity.
gto.generator.quests.24C55ACD83EBD447.de: Note that power generation depends on the difficulty you choose, expert mode generation is lower than normal mode.
The power generation data in this section comes from normal mode.
gto.generator.quests.2504764FE4CC9197.de: In normal mode, power generation ranges from a minimum of 1aUIV to a maximum of 1aOPV
gto.generator.quests.2E9DBF8609D42981.de: Without parallel generation, Concentrated Fuel 1 generates 1aMAX+5, and Concentrated Fuel 2 generates 1aMAX+6.
gto.generator.quests.309518DDB4E678F0.de: &cIn normal mode, the maximum power generation is 1aEv&r
gto.generator.quests.386B0478DD24A879.de: Generate power using the products of petroprocessing.
Due to the ease of interaction in GTM compared to GT5, small machines can complete high sixteen production lines.
Only burning high sixteen can support you until IV midgame, afterwards you need rocket fuel for generation.
gto.generator.quests.3D8CF6DAD8264F37.de: Maximum power generation depends on the voltage level of the laser chamber and the fuel's burn value.
Normal Power Chamber runs at 4 parallel with fuel consumption, IV Laser Chamber runs at 128 parallel, LUV Laser Chamber runs at 256 parallel, and so on.
&cReference in normal mode: Oxygen Plasma, Power Chamber generates 1aLUV power, IV Laser Chamber generates around 0.5aUHV.&r
gto.generator.quests.3D8CF6DAD8264F37.ti: Generate power directly using plasma, goodbye middlemen.
gto.generator.quests.490DDB37AC519DF1.de: &cIn normal mode, the maximum power generation is 1aIv&r
gto.generator.quests.52342935FC1D3B6F.de: Insert small generators for parallel generation, with an additional 1.5 times power output.
Wireless grid has a 5% power loss
&cMaximum of 4 small generators can be inserted&r
gto.generator.quests.57047A584A6E26E5.de: Used for launching, power generation is handled in the receiver.
gto.generator.quests.573F79427CA49684.de: Generate power in conjunction with heat exchange.
gto.generator.quests.5795384C57874FE0.de: EMI cannot directly query rotors, so listing all rotors for easy reference.
gto.generator.quests.7219F8307E1F25FB.de: Make adequate preparations and production lines to maintain this machine's power generation.
Try to use fuels with higher energy values and easier production, such as rocket fuel.
In normal mode, using rocket fuel Dinitrogen Tetroxide with Peroxide results in 1aUHV power generation.
Compared to other power generation facilities at the same stage, this one is more durable.
gto.generator.quests.737A6A4F33FF8610.de: &8High Energy Mechanical Blocks are not only in the host block, but also in the adjacent diagonal blocks.&r
gto.generator.quests.7DD7FF74F6AB342A.de: The main fuel for this series of generators is Benzene.
Due to the low energy value, power generation can barely support until EV late game, and thereafter it becomes increasingly difficult.

If you are not familiar with the &6Clean Room&r, check out the multiblock structure in EMI, you can also check the next page for instructions

Let's build a 5x5x5 Clean Room first, you can expand it as needed later. Power it up and let it run until the cleanliness reaches 100%. If the cleanliness is below 100%, machines in the Clean Room have a chance to consume items being made, so you need to keep the Clean Room running continuously!

Any maintenance issue will lower the cleanliness cap by 10%. Use Maintenance Prompt Cover with Redstone Lamp to monitor your Clean Room, or use the Automatic Maintenance Chamber to avoid the pain of maintenance.
More advanced chips and circuits need to be made in cleaner environments, which is why we need Clean Rooms
This is an interesting multiblock structure, you can place various single-block machines inside to provide the &eClean Room conditions&r needed for recipes!

Clean Room is a hollow multiblock structure ranging in size from 5x5x5 to 15x15x15. The bottom of the Clean Room does not need to be square, rectangles can also be used. The top layer is made of &6Filter Mechanical Blocks&r, except for the edges, which are &6Plastic Concrete&r blocks. &6Controller&r must be located at the center of the top layer. If the length or width of the Clean Room is even, the controller can be placed on either of the center two blocks (or four blocks). The rest of the structure is built of Plastic Concrete blocks.
&e&nNon-top layer&r blocks can be replaced with any number of blocks:

An &6Iron Door&r allows you to enter and exit the Clean Room. Make sure to keep it closed, otherwise the Clean Room will lose cleanliness rapidly. &6Travel Anchors&r and &6Elevators&r can also be used, and if needed, they can even be &eembedded into the floor&r.

You can use &6Diodes, Item Transport Chambers, Fluid Transport Chambers, or Machine Hulls&r to automatically transport power and materials through walls. However, be very careful when updating your internal machines. You must remove the old machine hulls and cables, then replace them with new ones of a higher voltage, otherwise you will be very disappointed. If it is only for material transportation, then you don't need to worry about the voltage.

If you want to see inside, you can use &6Clean Room Glass&r. If you like, you can even replace all non-top layer &6Plastic Concrete&r blocks with &6Clean Room Glass&r to make it look like a white beach house. The power consumption of this multiblock structure is unusual, starting at 30EU/t then gradually decreasing. But even at 30EU/t, make sure to give it enough power, you usually use MV power. Remember, this only applies to Clean Rooms, not a general rule.

gto.lv.quests.12F3FAEB69397980.descripti: The &6Power Storage&r is an essential component of multi-block power generation machines, responsible for outputting the machine's generated electricity.
Ordinary &6Power Storage&r only has &22A&r output capacity; you should continue to make more powerful power storage units to meet the machine's power generation capacity.

Before use, you need to &einscribe&r a circuit, which means placing circuit boards in its input bus and then opening the main block's GUI to press the inscribe circuit button; 16 are required.
gto.lv.quests.12FEAB1A9AA1BCA6.subtitle: Liberate circuit productivity
gto.lv.quests.16D0242E72E868B2.descripti: The &6Circuit Assembler&r is the most expensive and most valuable machine at each stage; it can reduce the cost of manually synthesized circuit boards by more than half.
From now on, almost all circuits you make in the future will need to be assembled on the &6Circuit Assembler&r, until the circuit assembly line.
&eSome recipes require additional conditions&r&6 which must be met; otherwise, the Circuit Assembler will not execute the recipe.
gto.lv.quests.16D0242E72E868B2.subtitle: Circuit automation!!

So there are two ways to speed up processing: increase voltage and increase current.
At the beginning, you need to install at least two &6LV Energy Storage&r units to increase power to smelt aluminum ingots.

Remember to add a parallel storage unit when you have the capacity in later stages.

在你之后获得了更好的资源之后，有一部分机器可以提供模块升级，它们允许机器添加更多能源仓，甚至有可能是加速仓或者并行仓等等

gto.lv.quests.4C535A516D8551F5.descripti: The input and output of this large machine can only be done through &6Steel Tank Valve&r.

Automatic output of &6Steel Tank Valve&r requires the opening to face downwards, but large steam tanks have no space to allow the steel tank valve to face downwards, so you need to use an electric pump and pipes to lead steam out of the tank.

&7If placed in certain dimensions, it can even serve as a 'mine'……&r

gto.lv.quests.6465CCE684E0DD3B.descripti: Input chambers/output chambers are used to provide fluids to multi-block machines,
Input buses/output buses are used to provide items to multi-block machines.
Before input/output assemblies can be synthesized, this combination must be maintained.
Note: If there is no corresponding output for a recipe, the machine will not execute the recipe.
Example: If your electric arc furnace does not have an output bus placed, it will not execute the aluminum ingot smelting recipe.
提示：所有的舱室都自带自动输入/输出，你也可以用软锤关闭舱室以禁用这个功能

And as stages progress, the quantity of resources required will become increasingly &cunbearable&r! So it's best to develop the habit of synthesizing batches of materials, even groups of ten or more.

gto.main-stoneage.quests.00FC570B313227A: You want to know why we didn't cut the trees first——can you cut them?
gto.main-stoneage.quests.06FE84E75DBE704: 高级终端功能极其强大，蹲下并右键可以看到详细的设置，这里将一一详细介绍：
&c线圈等级：&r影响多方块的线圈，从0开始到17，分别是18种不同的线圈，特别注意的是17号线圈是超级热容线圈。具体的等级划分可以从里程碑章节查看
&5重复结构次数：&r影响多方块的重复结构层数，例如装配线的长度，中子活化器的高度等。
eg.在搭建装配线的时候选择了重复结构15，则自动搭建合成配方16格的装配线
&e无仓室模式：&r在这个模式开启之后，可在该多方块上放置多个的功能性仓室将不会被放置，而唯一的功能性仓室则不受影响。
eg.在电力高炉上开启该模式后放置时，只会放置消声仓而不会放置输入输出仓等
&a线圈替换模式：&r模式开启后，对现有的多方块使用的时候会尝试使用背包或者AE内的符合“线圈等级”的线圈方块来进行替换
&b使用AE物品：&r顾名思义会使用AE的物品，前提是你身上有终端并且终端通过无线链接到了你的ME存储
gto.main-stoneage.quests.07169625BC595BD: You can obtain it by using the &eFarmer's Delight&r mod's &6Workbench&r here, you cannot dismantle flowers by hand!
gto.main-stoneage.quests.07C8D75D9011458: 多方块需要手撘？不不不，终端会帮你搞定一切
你只需要确保在背包内有多方块所需要的方块的情况下
蹲下对着多方块的主机右键即可搭建多方块
当然多方块的成型判定会有一定延迟
&8&o这个任务放在这里是为了提醒你要做这东西，并不是意味着你要在当前阶段就把它搓出来（你也搓不出来）&r&r
gto.main-stoneage.quests.0EFC6C245CC001C: Copper and tin mines, your most important mines at this stage.
If there are none nearby, you'll need to go a bit further to find some, mining an entire vein should be enough at this stage.
Highly Important Ores in the Early Game
gto.main-stoneage.quests.0F7F02C261EF18F: Place 3 &6Copper Dust&r and 1 &6Tin Dust&r on a crafting table to synthesize &6Bronze Dust&r, then smelt it in a furnace.
&o&7Unordered Crafting Recipe, it means you can place the powder in any slot.
gto.main-stoneage.quests.10C397237163BFF: A coke oven is a 3x3x3 hollow multiblock structure, remember to leave the center space open.
Prepare a &6Coke Oven Output Hatch&r for the output, otherwise, you'll have to move back and forth to scoop it up.
Coke produced by the coke oven burns for twice as long as normal coal, and the byproduct creosote oil is used to make Steam Age equipment.
&o&8You'll need to build a lot of coke ovens, one isn't enough to make steel.
gto.main-stoneage.quests.114AB458EFA1120: Using a knife to harvest grass has a high chance of dropping plant fibers, while breaking leaves with your hands has a chance to drop wooden sticks.
gto.main-stoneage.quests.12116F27AB89BB5: Throw &6Iron Ingot&r into the furnace to make &6Hot Iron Ingot&r, then use &6Forge Hammer&r to hammer it into &6Forged Iron Ingot&r on a crafting table.
You'll need a lot of it in the next stage.
gto.main-stoneage.quests.131CFAF95CFC993: If you've reached here, it means you've taken a critical step.
You must follow this path to achieve milestone development.
Although these tasks are not related to the main quest, they greatly improve your experience.
If you're stuck, remember to check them.
If you pay attention, you'll notice the different border shapes of the quests
gto.main-stoneage.quests.14A66BA5BC9DB22: Reached this far? If you've been playing from the start, you might want to take a rest.
You need to make a &6Low Voltage Steam Solid Fuel Boiler&r, you have to start with this machine.
&2Keep moving forward, the journey is long.&r
You can finally start doing something with steam
gto.main-stoneage.quests.15C69E5AE559EE9: You can't obtain mineral byproducts now.
When the time is right, you'll set up a simple mineral processing line!
Your best mineral processing method now—
gto.main-stoneage.quests.19EFE14C82DDAB6: Experience your &4GregTech:Odyssey&r journey in a more comfortable way!
gto.main-stoneage.quests.1ACA0000AE7FC80: 在你有多方块板条箱之前，这个小家伙&d绝对&r是一个非常优秀的存储容器
当然你需要用你刚刚获得的那些工具来制造它
gto.main-stoneage.quests.20AE5EDFB6C5902: 软锤不仅可以作为合成材料，也可以作为工具
gto.main-stoneage.quests.21C33087531A293: Make a &6Flint Axe&r, go ahead and chop!
gto.main-stoneage.quests.2403CDCD080D34B: Look around for some interesting things
可以去会员店买多一个，如果有需要的话
gto.main-stoneage.quests.2ABA8FC7FEAF192: You need to collect these plants to lay the foundation for future development.
1. &6Rubber Tree&r is quite different from the one in IC2 version, &6Resin&r drops along with the logs or leaves.
2. &6Sugar Cane&r is mainly used for paper production, of course, paper-making in GregTech differs from the original Minecraft.
It's recommended to reserve a spot for growing these crops.
gto.main-stoneage.quests.2E05753AF03C560: &6Assembly Machine&r can retrieve items from adjacent containers, acting as an early crafting terminal.
但是这个合成终端&c无法链接多个容器&r
gto.main-stoneage.quests.30D4CC9142D59DB: Wrench: Right-click to &9&lconfigure GT machine ports&r, and sneak-right-click to &9&lrotate machines&r, can also be used to break machines instead of a pickaxe.
gto.main-stoneage.quests.368F06963D54EFC: After all that, you might still need some meat to fill your stomach.
As for Animals? May they all be well
gto.main-stoneage.quests.39A6C5524A2490C: You need 116 &6Coke Oven Bricks&r to build a minimal usable coke oven.
gto.main-stoneage.quests.3BC9246D8FD4B64: Maybe you've never heard of the GregTech series, or perhaps you're a seasoned veteran. The quest book will guide you through all the milestone phases in an easy-to-understand way.
This modpack has significant changes in the process compared to the original GregTech series, so following the quest book might not be a bad idea.

&7However, the quest line does not guarantee the best experience in terms of flow. As you progress, you'll learn how to design and optimize your own production lines. This is the core fun of the GregTech series.&r
So, what should you do first? Make flint tools and find an area close to water as your early development base.
Press &e[Tab]&r to open the quest book anytime, anywhere. Most tasks will only be visible after you complete the previous one.
&7&o&mAnd there are some hidden Easter Egg tasks&r
&r&4Do not&r stay up all night grinding, your health is the foundation of your journey!!
&9&oOur journey is the stars and the sea&r
gto.main-stoneage.quests.3CF903DBC993F28: This might be the first Easter Egg quest you come across.
gto.main-stoneage.quests.3E80C257F74352D: Right-clicking &6Grass&r has a high chance of dropping wheat seeds, and a small chance of dropping carrots or other crops.
gto.main-stoneage.quests.43D37FAEE15EE97: All wooden and stone tools are disabled, so you have to start with flint tools.
You need to make your first &6Flint Axe&r to chop trees, and a &6Flint Axe&r made without a workbench only has 16 durability.
gto.main-stoneage.quests.45C8A2DF9C0E547: GregTech ores are generated in veins, each vein contains specific ores. &ePress U to check vein generation information&r
&oThe limit of chain mining depends on your tool level, the higher the level, the more blocks you can chain mine, if electrified, you can chain mine more blocks, see the hint section for details.
gto.main-stoneage.quests.4920255C0FDE618: 这东西在接下来的合成中是可以重复利用的，所以造一个就好了
gto.main-stoneage.quests.4993AFF5280AC83: Here are other minerals you need to mine, not that urgent at this stage, just stockpile some.
gto.main-stoneage.quests.4DC482C16035F26: The &6Basic Backpack&r you start with can't hold much, but it does save your inventory.
&7Tip: When building multiblock structures using terminal formation, you can put the excess blocks or chambers into the backpack.
gto.main-stoneage.quests.4F77CB97CE068D7: Scoop up a bit with a bucket, you might not need it now but you will later.
Once you reach LV, you can use a basic pump to extract crude oil from oil springs— you'll need crude oil and build a petrochemical production line.
gto.main-stoneage.quests.514A8AAF7CF7D67: This is an Ad Astra oil well, this structure only generates in the ocean.
If you can't find GregTech's original oil spring, you can extract it from this.
&7&oNote the difference between petroleum and crude oil, you should check EMI&r
gto.main-stoneage.quests.561D79DE960A034: Its recipe is quite different from the original Minecraft, you need 2 &6Flints&r and 2 &6Logs&r.
Of course, you can also check EMI for the crafting recipe, then click the plus sign to automatically synthesize it when you have enough materials.
gto.main-stoneage.quests.5A8040869C6ECAD: 也许你需要准备一个小牧场来产出食物
gto.main-stoneage.quests.5C4137F64F9ADA5: Main Content Corresponding to Voltage Levels
gto.main-stoneage.quests.6517DDBE8132FA9: Unlike the previous work, all creatures in this version have been strengthened to varying degrees based on their difficulty.
May Your Inner Hero Burn in Battle
gto.main-stoneage.quests.664BDC18052B54F: Alright, you need to gather some clay now.
You'll need clay to make the next few big machines.
Just Played with Clay a Bit
gto.main-stoneage.quests.67264EF0565CC03: You also need these, it's recommended to mine more.
gto.main-stoneage.quests.6BA5DA36E816380: The coke oven hatch can act as both input and output, it &eWon't&r automatically pull items, but it can &eAutomatically output items and fluids&r from the output hatch.
So to achieve automation, you might need a funnel.
The coke oven hatch shares its contents with the main block.
gto.main-stoneage.quests.6D4B71E543059C1: You need 116 &6Coke Oven Bricks&r to build a minimal usable coke oven.
所以你需要搓116个压缩&6焦黏土&r
对的，专家模式下会更难
然后我们需要把这堆东西挤进来
gto.main-stoneage.quests.734195C86A471D2: FTBUtimine's chain mining feature consumes saturation by default, so it's still very important to eat well.
Simple agricultural production is a great choice to provide some food.
Submit any one of the following tasks.
gto.main-stoneage.quests.73479CC3BADD15F: These tools are mainly used for crafting.
Most tool-using crafting recipes can be replaced by corresponding machines later, saving more resources. But until then, you'll need to manually craft some things.
Here are some tools you can craft now, to improve your tools.
gto.main-stoneage.quests.77EE7D3484410CE: This might be the best way to prevent monster attacks.
gto.main-stoneage.quests.78A394F6AE731B5: Get some clay, keep the wooden sticks.
gto.main-stoneage.quests.7D6FCF32575CB7D: You need wood to keep progressing, if you find you can't cut trees, check the prerequisites.
Want to Get Rich? Chop Trees First!

Starting from this sequence, LV circuits no longer require ULV circuits to be synthesized, but are directly synthesized based on etched chips
&r&6Basic Integrated Circuit&r is the earliest form of &eIntegrated Circuit&r

You will discover that each sequence only has three circuits. The highest level circuit is usually just the &ekey&r to unlock the next phase, as it will soon be replaced by the &eequivalent circuit&r of the &eadvanced sequence&r due to its relatively lower cost

gto.mv.quests.5ACCABFAB15E0A59.descripti: As the name suggests, a machine used for crystallization. &6Monocrystalline Silicon&r is a type of single element crystal

When molten silicon solidifies, silicon atoms arrange into a diamond crystal lattice to form a crystal nucleus, the nucleus grows into crystal grains with the same crystal orientation, forming monocrystalline silicon.
This process is generally called &eCrystal Pulling&r
Crystal formation generally requires &6Crystal Seed&r and &6Pure Saturated Solution&r, sometimes also &6Protective Gas&r

&7Click to turn the page for operations &r

&b       无线传输覆盖板&r：分为&6无线物品传输覆盖板&r和&6无线流体覆盖板&r及其&d进阶版&r；
用法：在&4单方块机器&r上安装即可；
特点：为&c单台&r单方块机器额外提供在GUI内可以打开的18格存储空间，物品&4不可堆叠&r；
用法：在&e单方块机器&r，&e多方块机器主机&r或&e输入仓室&r任意一面安装即可；通过设置&4红石信号&r和普通/反相模式&b控制机器开关&r；
特点：若安装的方块上还有&e电动泵&r，&e传送带&r等物流覆盖板，则&6机器控制覆盖板&r可以设置为对&e物流覆盖板&r进行控制；&6机器控制覆盖板&r可被强/弱充能方块激活；
用法：主手拿着&e覆盖板&r对任一容器如&e超级箱&r，&e超级缸&r，&eME接口&r等，蹲下右键绑定，随后将&e覆盖板&r贴到&e单方块机器的输出口&r或&e多方块机器的输出仓室&r，即可无线传输物品/流体；
特点：可进行&d跨维度传输&r；进阶版可以安装&e过滤卡&r;
&r        用法：在搭建无线充能器结构后，给其供电，在主机中放置&6HV及以上等级的力场发生器&r后，可以给&e无线充能覆盖板&r所贴方块内的物品充电；如给&e原木拟生场&r中的&e链锯&r充电；
特点：可以安装在&e板条箱&r和&e部分&r机器主机上；
&r        用法：在&d单方块机器&r上安装&6可编程覆盖板&r，就可在发配样板物品时为机器发送&e虚拟物品&r;
特点：使得只需&c单台&r单方块机器即可运行不同电路或者模具/模头的配方;

gto.uv.quests.0AD0174C98673F5B.descripti: 在之后的巨构中，你将可以使用这四种增益仓室提高机器效率：
&a并行仓&r：可并行机器即可使用。允许机器一次性翻倍功率处理多个配方，某种意义下相当于提供无损超频。
&a加速仓&r：部分机器可以使用。&b无条件&r加快机器速度，数字表示当加速仓等级&b高于&r配方等级时，配方时间将乘以这个百分比。当加速仓等级每&b低于&r配方一级，加速效果减少20个百分点。
&a线程仓&r：仅跨配方并行机器可以使用。允许机器尽量同时多运行数个&b不同配方&r来跑满并行和最高效率。
&a超频仓&r：几乎只有巨构可以使用。非常强大，能直接&b修改机器超频的时间倍率系数&r。UV级别是一般的有损超频，UEV级别即可达到无损超频，而更高等级UXV可以达到4倍功率6倍速度，也就是说机器越超频越省电！
此外，可配置维护仓也可以提供微弱的机器加速效果

gto.wireless-energy.quests.0828014567C61: Wireless power grids have a &ebidirectional &rtransmission rate limit. Power generation exceeding this limit cannot be input into the grid, and power exceeding the transmission limit cannot be drawn from the grid
gto.wireless-energy.quests.0EED467C2B883: Before having a &6Energy Storage Substation &r, you can only use &6Battery Boxes &ras &eenergy carriers for the wireless power grid &r

The &eamount and grade of batteries &rin a &6Battery Box &rdetermines the single transmission limit, each battery can provide power equivalent to 1A current of its voltage grade. For example, &64x any small battery &rcan provide &24*32=128 EU/t &rsingle transmission limit
The &6Battery Box &ritself &eDoes not affect the transmission limit &r, you just need to make a &616x Battery Box &r, then change the batteries as needed to increase the transmission limit
&nRight-click the &6Battery Box &rwith the &6Wireless Energy Binding Tool &rin hand to bind the container &r
gto.wireless-energy.quests.1506E8C557277: A cover for single-block machines, only one can be installed per machine
Can be installed on Battery Boxes
gto.wireless-energy.quests.20B8E68273D7D: Thanks to the wireless energy system provided by GTMThings, employees no longer need to set up the 'Spaghetti Energy Network'

Although &7LV &rstage batteries can make &6Wireless Energy Interfaces &rand &6Wireless Energy Receivers &r, you can only start building a &6Wireless Energy Tower &rafter &bMV &rstage to set up a complete wireless power grid

To use the wireless power grid, you need to build Battery Boxes/Energy Storage Substations and Storage Libraries, the former determines your &eTransmission Limit per tick &r, and the latter determines the &eGrid Capacity &r
gto.wireless-energy.quests.27743BDBF0CBE: Installed on the Wireless Energy Tower, it sends a redstone signal based on the percentage/absolute value of the grid's power and the set maximum/minimum threshold values, with RS latch function
gto.wireless-energy.quests.2F9D9F9271159: Wireless power grid energy storage requires a carrier
The &6Wireless Energy Tower &rand &6Wireless Energy Unit &rprovide this function, you only need one of these structures
gto.wireless-energy.quests.3D4EDD8BE3A2A: Thanks to the changes in the new wireless power grid mechanism, you can control the start and stop of supply and demand side machines in the grid based on the redstone signals actively emitted by the wireless power grid
To a certain extent, it can achieve &dintelligent power generation and production &r, reducing resource waste!
&eInstall an Energy Detection Cover on the main block of the Wireless Energy Tower to send redstone signals based on the grid's power percentage &r
gto.wireless-energy.quests.45A7EB99929CD: &6Energy Storage Substation &ris a powerful wireless energy carrier, the &eamount and grade of Lamberton Capacitors &rin it determines the single transmission limit
Each capacitor can provide power equivalent to 32A current of its voltage grade, &6Energy Storage Substation &rmaximum transmission limit is &eSum of power provided by the capacitors &r
&dEnergy Storage Substation can hold up to 18 layers of capacitors &r
&nRight-click the &6Substation &rwith the &6Wireless Energy Binding Tool &rin hand to bind the container &r
gto.wireless-energy.quests.4E01E0067B982: As the name suggests, used to monitor the operating status of the wireless power grid
The main information displayed on the monitor interface:
·Total Energy: determined by the &6grade and quantity &rof &6Energy Units &rin the &6Wireless Energy Tower &r
·Single Transmission Limit: determined by the &6Battery Box &ror &6Energy Storage Substation &r
·Positive Net Power: indicates the system is generating power, energy flowing into the grid
·Negative Net Power: indicates the system is consuming power, energy flowing out of the grid
gto.wireless-energy.quests.50BD070E09091: &6The grade of Structural Glass &rin the &6Wireless Energy Tower &rdetermines the &6Energy Units &rthat can be activated, make sure to use Structural Glass that is at least as high as the grade of the &6Energy Units &ryou install
&2Total Capacity=&nActivated&r&2 Sum of Energy Unit capacities*unit quantity/2 &r&r
&dWireless Energy Tower can hold up to 30 layers of energy units

&r&7To quickly and cheaply increase your grid's total capacity, you can stack a lot of low-grade energy units, but this will require you to replace a large number of low-grade units to reduce losses &r
gto.wireless-energy.quests.5E2410977FB75: Installed on the Wireless Energy Tower, it sends a redstone signal based on the current power/total capacity percentage of the grid
gto.wireless-energy.quests.6AB84D44D2BB0: &6Wireless Energy Storage Units &rcan directly draw power from the wireless power grid
